member.summary: Static server object

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebAppFrame.Database.Db4oServerModule.Configure
member.summary: Registers an alias for persistent classes namespace and assembly. The current assembly is temporary and renamed after each recompilation, that is why it can not be used for persistence. An alias name is used to persist the classes

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebAppFrame.Database.Db4oServerModule.InitServer(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,Db4objects.Db4o.Config.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes server configutration. Set port to 0 to open server in embedded mode
member.param: port used by server (0 for embedded server)
db username (not used in embedded mode)
db user password (not used in embedded mode)
custom configurtion. leave null to use defaults

member.summary: Checks for rights in class's RequiredRightsAttribute

member.name: T:Ploosqva.WebAppFrame.Database.Db4oHttpModule
member.summary: This module opens a client connection to a db4o database server. By default client tries to connect to embedded server To change default behavior, HttpApplicationState variables dbServerEmbedded, dbHost, dbPort, dbUser and dbPass have to be set.

member.name: F:Ploosqva.WebAppFrame.Database.Db4oHttpModule.KEY_DB4O_CLIENT
member.summary: keys for the named parameters in Web.config

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebAppFrame.Database.Db4oHttpModule.InitClient(System.Boolean,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes database client connection parameters
member.param: if true, will try to connect to a locally running db4o server and will ignore the other parameters
server host address/ip. If null, localhost is used
server port. If null, 10000 is used
db username as set using Db4oServerModule#Init
db user password as set using Db4oServerModule#Init

member.name: M:Ploosqva.WebAppFrame.Database.Db4oHttpModule.Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Initializes the Db4oHttpModule, and sets server data from HttpApplicationState (if set)
